subject: Personal Finance
title: The Power of Awareness
description: A tiny lesson with a big payoff: The Power of Awareness.

hook.text: You can't fix a bias you don't know you have. Recognition is the first financial superpower.

buildup.text: Most money mistakes happen on autopilot. We barely notice when swiping a credit card.

discovery.text: Simply naming a bias as it happens reduces its power. 'That's anchoring' breaks the spell.

twist.text: But awareness fades. Without regular practice, old patterns return within weeks.

climax.text: The best investors aren't the smartest. They're the most self-aware about their own biases.

punchline.text: Know your brain, save your wallet.

quiz.question: What is the first step to overcoming financial biases?
